text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump U took the biggest step in January by limiting travel from China where coronavirus originated. THANK YOU, GOD BLESS U OUR FIRST FAMILY VP PENCE AND GOP DEFENDING THE USA CONSTITUTION & OUR FREEDOM! YOUR A GIFT FROM GOD TO US❤️❤️❤️❤️🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
